page.title: 13CLAUDETTE-STANION-(CONT.)
page.content: My friends and I talk or play games like Drain Tig until 10.45am.At 10.45am we carry on with our lessons. In the mornings we do lessons such as maths or English.At 12.00 we have dinner,some people go home,some people bring a packed lunch,most people have a school dinner which I have.My favourite is chips,peas and fish fingers with cherry yogurt for afters.Usually at about 12.45pm we go out to play until 1.15pm.When playtime is over we have lessons until 2.30pm when we have another break.In the afternoon we have lessons like art or P.E.On Friday afternoon we play rounders or cricket.At 2.30pm we go outside and play games until 2.45pm.At 2.45pm we have some more lessons until we go home at 3.45pm.When I get home I have my tea and then I go outside with
